description:
Added information on the slight difference between rpm and deb based installs for Go.
Also adjusted the subheadings to make them more accurate.

messages.text:
Thanks, but I'd rather not turn that section into a list of instructions for every system that exists.  It hits the two main ones and does say "or the equivalent on your Linux distribution".  That paragraph is a bump in the road along the way to installing Go; expanding it makes it feel too much like the main event.  I expect that people on rpm systems already know to type yum, and the package list is almost identical.
(Similarly, there's no command line for FreeBSD.)

subject: Added information on the slight difference between rpm ...
